Create a 1/1 blue Illusion creature token with “This gets +1/+1 for each other Illusion you control.”
Coalesce {6}{B} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for {6}{B}. If you do, it enters as a Horror creature after it resolves. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
Misery Keeps Company is an Illusion in addition to its other types while it’s a creature.
